content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft a Stone Furnace because I do not have any stone, which is a raw resource that must be gathered first. 
# This reinforces the fact that I am in a resource-scarce environment with no means to gather or craft anything.

# Given this situation, I need to take a different approach. Since all attempts to find resources have failed, I will try to reset my position and check for resources again.

# I will move to a different position entirely to see if there are any resources available in a new area. 
# I will move to a new coordinate that is further away from my current position to explore a broader area.

move_to(Position(x=10.0, y=10.0))  # Moving diagonally to a new position to explore for resources.
